abstract: The nonprofit organization that presides over the SAT and the Advanced Placement program, among other critical components of the college admissions process, brings its annual conference to New York.
snippet: The nonprofit organization that presides over the SAT and the Advanced Placement program, among other critical components of the college admissions process, brings its annual conference to New York.
lead_paragraph: The annual conference of the College Board, the organization that oversees the SAT and the Advanced Placement program, among other critical components of the college admissions process, kicks off Wednesday in New York City.

headline.main: The Choice at the College Board Conference
